sense.gloss: Kshitigarbha (bodhisattva who looks over children, travellers and the underworld), Ksitigarbha, Jizō

sdata.j: ↑借↑↓か↓りる↑時↑↓とき↓の↑地蔵顔↑↓|じぞう|がお↓、↑返↑↓かえ↓す↑時↑↓とき↓の閻魔↑顔↑↓がお↓。
sdata.e: One is happy when borrowing something, but upset when the time comes to return it.

sdata.j: ↑借↑↓か↓りる↑時↑↓とき↓の↑地蔵顔↑↓|じぞう|がお↓、↑返↑↓かえ↓す↑時↑↓とき↓の閻魔↑顔↑↓がお↓。
sdata.e: A person will have the face of an angel when borrowing something, but the face of the devil when returning it.
